__e: Sausage for you and water for you, right?
I give you wine and sausage, and you...
You just tell me where this Wienie King lives... and I'll take his money back to him and tell him what I think of him.
"Certainly is smooth and damp-looking, but whoever heard of a 172-pound sausage six feet tall?"
And we have some very fine pork sausages.
This sausage is very good, we'll come back.
What kind of bloody sausage is that?
